import { Container } from '../../style'; const CreateOnlineClass = () => { return (

Creating a Class

After logging in to your teacher’s account, you can click the “+Create New Class” button to list start listing a class. You will have to fill up the details of the class which include: the title, thumbnail, summary, minimum and maximum class size, duration and schedule, age range, price, assessments, sources, and materials for the course. Once submitted, we will review the class and will get back to you in 3-5 business days to tell you if the class is approved. If the class was not approved, do not worry, we will be working with you to improve your classes to make sure you will give the best learning experience for your students.

 

Tagpros Class Criteria

We want Tagpros classes to be relevant and inclusive to the widest audience, so parents can participate in any Tagpros class knowing they will not be subjected to a teacher's personal, religious, or political beliefs, as well as other objectionable content. Here are the three primary criteria that Tagpros want to see in class content:

  • Classes should not promote religion
  • Classes should be based on facts and evidence
  • Classes should be suitable for the target age

In addition, Tagpros classes should not promote discrimination, hate speech, or violence. Tagpros welcomes learners, families, and teachers across all pillars of diversity; this includes, but is not limited to, race, ethnicity, nationality, sexual orientation, religion, and gender identity. In the case of ambiguity, Tagpros will decide on the allowed topics on a case-to-case basis.

 

Respond to Messages

Once we have approved the publishing of your class, it will now be listed on our website and learners can now enroll in it. Your class details will contain a “Send Message” button that users can see. If a parent or learner wants to ask a question about the class, they can use that button to contact you. We recommend you be responsive to increase the likelihood of them enrolling in your class.

 

Jitsi

Finally, we recommend that you fully understand the features of Jitsi. This will allow you to facilitate the learning environment more effectively and provide a better experience for everyone. To learn more about Jitsi’s features, watch this video.

); }; export default CreateOnlineClass;
